I 42 club qualificati alla fase a gironi riceveranno 2,92 milioni di euro ciascuno. Per ogni partita sono inoltre previsti dei bonus in base alle prestazioni: 570.000 euro per una vittoria e 190.000 euro per un pareggio. Gli importi non distribuiti in caso di paritÃ  saranno raccolti e ridistribuiti tra le squadre con quote proporzionali alle prestazioni. Alle qualificate ai sedicesimi di finale spetterÃ  un premio di 500.000 euro. Le vincenti dei gironi riceveranno inoltre un bonus di 1 milione di euro, mentre alle seconde andranno 500.000 euro.Â La finale di questa edizione di Europa League si terrÃ  il 27 maggio 2020 allo Stadion Energa GdaÅ„sk di Danzica, in Polonia.

text:
Europa League, Thursday's results
Lazio lost again, at home, against Celtic Glasgow; Roma are playing against Borussia MÃ¶nchengladbach

07 Nov 2019, 20:56

The fourth day of the UEFA Europa League group stage took place between Wednesday and Thursday. For today, 23 games were scheduled, twelve starting at 6.55pm, the others starting at 9pm. The two Italian teams involved in the tournament are the two Roman teams, Roma and Lazio: the former lost to Borussia MÃ¶nchengladbach 2-1, Lazio have lost against Celtic Glasgow 1-2. The only match of the day that took place yesterday was Guimaraes-Arsenal, which ended 1-1.

The 42 clubs qualified for the group stage will receive â‚¬ 2.92 million each. For each match there are also bonuses based on performance: 570,000 euros for a win and 190,000 euros for a draw. The amounts not distributed in the event of a tie will be collected and redistributed between the teams with proportional shares to the performances. Qualifiers in the final round of the final will receive a prize of 500,000 euros. The group winners will also receive a bonus of 1 million euros, while the latter will receive 500,000 euros. The final of this edition of the Europa League will be held on 27 May 2020 at the Stadion Energa GdaÅ„sk in Gdansk, Poland.
